abstract: Cincinnati Reds agree in principle to trade second baseman Brandon Phillips to Washington Nationals, pending his waiving of his no-trade clause; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cincinnati Reds and the Washington Nationals agreed in principle to a trade that will send second baseman Brandon Phillips from the Reds to the Nationals for multiple minor league players.
snippet: The Cincinnati Reds and the Washington Nationals agreed in principle to a trade that will send second baseman Brandon Phillips from the Reds to the Nationals for multiple minor league players.
